title: so guess what i found out,
body: twice now riot has intentionlly dc'd me from a ranked game in match selection, i didnt even know i got dc'd i could move around and access lobby  and then when i said this to riot at lol support which they probaly didnt even read it, most likely just a automated question, they completelty ignored what i said and said if you continue to afk  the leaver buster system blah blah, when my internet in running fine and i get dc'd it dont matter how it happens its 100% riots fault, even if my internet is running its shittest it doesnt result in dc, when i get dc'd i know its cause of riots servers not my end, i just love how riot completely ignores the question all together, they dont even deny it so its probley true,
